annotations.description: This year I was compelled to create something for the Oscars. I thought it would be nice to have something to sip on while you guys (if you are) watch the sh...
annotations.title: Original Cocktail: Life is Beautiful

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Campari
1oz (30ml) Cocchi Americano
.375oz (11ml) Lemon Juice
.375oz (11ml) Lime Juice
.25oz (7.5ml) Simple Syrup
Pinch of Ceylon Cinnamon

Pour a little soda water and champage into wine glass with ice.
Shake and strain into glass

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z19j9orCkCo
title: Life is Beautiful
